title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the library file.
2. Add a label to the library file.
3. Navigate to the library outline view.
4. Select the label item in the library outline view.
